amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Rental Housing Assistance by $7 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Rental Housing Assistance by $7 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 283 (Roll no. 280).
